trans-unit.source: about_CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: about_CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: About CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: 有关 CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: about_CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: about_CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: about_CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: about_CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 简短说明

trans-unit.source: Describes the parameters that can be used with any cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 描述可与任何 cmdlet 一起使用的参数。

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 详细说明

trans-unit.source: The common parameters are a set of cmdlet parameters that you can use with any cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 以下常见参数是一组可用于任何 cmdlet 的 cmdlet 参数。

trans-unit.source: They are implemented by Windows PowerShell, not by the cmdlet developer, and they are automatically available to any cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 它们实现的 Windows PowerShell 中，不是由 cmdlet 开发人员，且它们可自动提供给任何 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: You can use the common parameters with any cmdlet, but they might not have an effect on all cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用以下常见参数与任何 cmdlet，但他们可能不具备对所有 cmdlet 的效果。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a cmdlet does not generate any verbose output, using the Verbose common parameter has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果一个 cmdlet 不生成任何详细输出，则使用 Verbose 通用参数具有不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The common parameters are also available on advanced functions that use the CmdletBinding attribute or the Parameter attribute, and on all workflows.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以使用 CmdletBinding 属性或参数属性的高级函数和上的所有工作流公用参数的。

trans-unit.source: Several common parameters override system defaults or preferences that you set by using the Windows PowerShell preference variables.
trans-unit.target: 几个常见参数重写系统默认值或通过使用 Windows PowerShell 首选项变量设置的首选项。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the preference variables, the common parameters affect only the commands in which they are used.
trans-unit.target: 与首选项变量中，以下常见参数会影响仅使用它们的命令。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the common parameters, many cmdlets offer the WhatIf and Confirm risk mitigation parameters.
trans-unit.target: 除了常用的参数，许多 cmdlet 提供 WhatIf 并确认风险缓解参数。

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets that involve risk to the system or to user data usually offer these parameters.
trans-unit.target: 通常涉及到系统或用户数据的风险的 Cmdlet 提供这些参数。

trans-unit.source: The following list displays the common parameters.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表显示通用参数。

trans-unit.source: Their aliases are listed in parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 括号中列出了其别名。

trans-unit.source: -Debug (db) -ErrorAction (ea) -ErrorVariable (ev) -InformationAction -InformationVariable -OutVariable (ov) -OutBuffer (ob) -PipelineVariable (pv) -Verbose (vb) -WarningAction (wa) -WarningVariable (wv
trans-unit.target: 调试 (db)-ErrorAction (ea)-ErrorVariable (ev)-InformationAction-InformationVariable-OutVariable (ov)-OutBuffer (ob) PipelineVariable (pv)-Verbose (vb)-WarningAction (wa)-WarningVariable （西弗吉尼亚州

trans-unit.source: The risk mitigation parameters are: -WhatIf (wi) -Confirm (cf)
trans-unit.target: 风险缓解参数有:-WhatIf (wi) 的确认 (cf)

trans-unit.source: For more information about preference variables, type: help about_Preference_Variables
trans-unit.target: 有关首选项变量的详细信息，请键入︰ 帮助 about_Preference_Variables

trans-unit.source: COMMON PARAMETER DESCRIPTIONS
trans-unit.target: 常见参数说明

trans-unit.source: -Debug[:{$true | $false}] Alias: db
trans-unit.target: -Debug [: {$true | $false}] 别名︰ db

trans-unit.source: Displays programmer-level detail about the operation performed by the command.
trans-unit.target: 显示有关由命令执行的操作的程序员级别详细信息。

trans-unit.source: This parameter works only when the command generates a debugging message.
trans-unit.target: 此参数仅用于该命令将生成的调试消息。

trans-unit.source: For example, this parameter works when a command contains the Write-Debug cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此参数适用时的命令包含 Write-debug cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The Debug parameter overrides the value of the $DebugPreference variable for the current command, setting the value of $DebugPreference to Inquire.
trans-unit.target: Debug 参数将覆盖当前命令，$DebugPreference 将该值设置为 Inquire $DebugPreference 变量的值。

trans-unit.source: Because the default value of the $DebugPreference variable is SilentlyContinue, debugging messages are not displayed by default.
trans-unit.target: 因为 $DebugPreference 变量的默认值为 SilentlyContinue，默认情况下不显示调试消息。

trans-unit.source: Valid values:
trans-unit.target: 有效值：

trans-unit.source: $true (-Debug:$true).
trans-unit.target: $true (-调试︰ $true)。

trans-unit.source: Has the same effect as -Debug.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同的效果的调试。

trans-unit.source: $false (-Debug:$false).
trans-unit.target: $false (-调试︰ $false)。

trans-unit.source: Suppresses the display of debugging messages when the value of the $DebugPreference is not SilentlyContinue (the default).
trans-unit.target: 取消显示调试消息时 $DebugPreference 的值不为 SilentlyContinue （默认值）。

trans-unit.source: -ErrorAction[:{Continue | Ignore | Inquire | SilentlyContinue | Stop | Suspend }] Alias: ea
trans-unit.target: -ErrorAction [: {继续 |忽略 |查询 |SilentlyContinue |停止 |挂起}] 别名︰ ea

trans-unit.source: Determines how the cmdlet responds to a non-terminating error from the command.
trans-unit.target: 确定该 cmdlet 如何响应来自该命令的一个非终止错误。

trans-unit.source: This parameter works only when the command generates a non-terminating error, such as those from the Write-Error cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此参数仅用于该命令将生成非终止错误，例如写入错误 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The ErrorAction parameter overrides the value of the $ErrorActionPreference variable for the current command.
trans-unit.target: ErrorAction 参数将覆盖当前命令 $ $ErrorActionPreference 变量的值。

trans-unit.source: Because the default value of the $ErrorActionPreference variable is Continue, error messages are displayed and execution continues unless you use the ErrorAction parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因为 $ErrorActionPreference 变量的默认值为 Continue，会显示错误消息并继续执行，除非使用 ErrorAction 参数。

trans-unit.source: The ErrorAction parameter has no effect on terminating errors (such as missing data, parameters that are not valid, or insufficient permissions) that prevent a command from completing successfully.
trans-unit.target: ErrorAction 参数不起作用上终止错误 （例如缺少数据、 参数不是有效的或没有足够的权限），阻止命令成功完成。

trans-unit.source: Valid values:
trans-unit.target: 有效值：

trans-unit.source: Continue.
trans-unit.target: 继续进行。

trans-unit.source: Displays the error message and continues executing the command.
trans-unit.target: 显示的错误消息并继续执行该命令。

trans-unit.source: "Continue" is the default value.
trans-unit.target: "继续"是默认值。

trans-unit.source: Ignore.
trans-unit.target: 忽略。

trans-unit.source: Suppresses the error message and continues executing the command.
trans-unit.target: 禁止显示错误消息并继续执行该命令。

trans-unit.source: Unlike SilentlyContinue, Ignore does not add the error message to the $Error automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 与不同的是 SilentlyContinue，忽略不会添加到 $Error 自动变量的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The Ignore value is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Ignore 值是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: Inquire.
trans-unit.target: 查询。

trans-unit.source: Displays the error message and prompts you for confirmation before continuing execution.
trans-unit.target: 显示的错误消息并提示您在继续执行前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: This value is rarely used.
trans-unit.target: 很少使用此值。

trans-unit.source: SilentlyContinue.
trans-unit.target: SilentlyContinue。

trans-unit.source: Suppresses the error message and continues executing the command.
trans-unit.target: 禁止显示错误消息并继续执行该命令。

trans-unit.source: Stop.
trans-unit.target: 停止。

trans-unit.source: Displays the error message and stops executing the command.
trans-unit.target: 显示的错误消息并停止执行命令。

trans-unit.source: Suspend.
trans-unit.target: 挂起。

trans-unit.source: This value is only available in Windows PowerShell workflows.
trans-unit.target: 此值仅可在 Windows PowerShell 工作流。

trans-unit.source: When a workflow runs into terminating error, this action preference automatically suspends the job to allow for further investigation.
trans-unit.target: 工作流运行时为终止错误，此操作首选项自动将挂起该作业，以允许进一步的调查。

trans-unit.source: After investigation, the workflow can be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 在调查之后, 可以继续工作流。

trans-unit.source: -ErrorVariable [+]<variable-name> Alias: ev
trans-unit.target: -ErrorVariable [+] < 变量名称 > 别名︰ ev

trans-unit.source: Stores error messages about the command in the specified variable and in the $Error automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 将在指定的变量和 $Error 自动变量中存储有关该命令的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, type the following command:
trans-unit.target: 详细信息，请键入以下命令︰

trans-unit.source: get-help about_Automatic_Variables
trans-unit.target: 获取帮助 about_Automatic_Variables

trans-unit.source: By default, new error messages overwrite error messages that are already stored in the variable.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，新的错误消息会覆盖已存储在变量中的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: To append the error message to the variable content, type a plus sign (+) before the variable name.
trans-unit.target: 若要将错误消息追加到变量的内容，请变量名之前键入加号 （+）。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command creates the $a variable and then stores any errors in it:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的命令创建 $a 变量并将任何错误存储在它中︰

trans-unit.source: Get-Process -Id 6 -ErrorVariable a
trans-unit.target: Get-process-Id 6 ErrorVariable

trans-unit.source: The following command adds any error messages to the $a variable:
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令将添加到 $a 变量的任何错误消息︰

trans-unit.source: Get-Process -Id 2 -ErrorVariable +a
trans-unit.target: Get-process-Id 为 2 ErrorVariable + a

trans-unit.source: The following command displays the contents of $a:
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令显示 $ a︰ 内容

trans-unit.source: $a
You can use this parameter to create a variable that contains only error messages from specific commands.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可用于创建包含仅来自特定命令的错误消息的变量。

trans-unit.source: The $Error automatic variable contains error messages from all the commands in the session.
trans-unit.target: $Error 自动变量在会话中包含所有命令的错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: You can use array notation, such as $a[0] or $error[1,2] to refer to specific errors stored in the variables.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用数组表示法，如 $a [0] 或 $error [1，2] 来引用存储在变量中的特定错误。

trans-unit.source: -InformationAction [:{SilentlyContinue | Stop | Continue | Inquire | Ignore | Suspend}] Alias: ia
trans-unit.target: -InformationAction [: {SilentlyContinue |停止 |继续 |查询 |忽略 |挂起}] 别名︰ ia

trans-unit.source: Introduced in Windows PowerShell 5.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 5.0 中引入。

trans-unit.source: Within the command or script in which it is used, the InformationAction common parameter overrides the value of the $InformationPreference preference variable, which by default is set to SilentlyContinue.
trans-unit.target: 在命令或使用它的脚本中，InformationAction 通用参数覆盖 $InformationPreference 首选项变量，它们的默认值设置为 SilentlyContinue 的值。

trans-unit.source: When you use Write-Information in a script with -InformationAction, Write-Information values are shown depending on the value of the -InformationAction parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当与-InformationAction，脚本中使用写入信息写入信息值会显示根据-InformationAction 参数的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about $InformationPreference, see about_Preference_Variables.
trans-unit.target: 有关 $InformationPreference 详细信息，请参阅 about_Preference_Variables。

trans-unit.source: Valid values: Stop: Stops a command or script at an occurrence of the Write-Information command.
trans-unit.target: 有效值︰ 停止︰ 停止命令或在出现的写入信息命令的脚本。

trans-unit.source: Ignore Suppresses the informational message and continues running the command.
trans-unit.target: 忽略取消信息性消息，并将继续运行该命令。

trans-unit.source: Unlike SilentlyContinue, Ignore completely "forgets" the informational message; it does not add the informational message to the information stream.
trans-unit.target: 与不同的是 SilentlyContinue，忽略完全"忘记"信息性消息;它不为信息流添加信息性消息。

trans-unit.source: Inquire: Displays the informational message that you specify in a Write-Information command, then asks whether you want to continue.
trans-unit.target: 查询︰ 显示在写入信息命令中，指定的信息性消息，然后询问您是否要继续。

trans-unit.source: Continue: Displays the informational message, and continues running.
trans-unit.target: 继续︰ 显示信息性消息，并继续运行。

trans-unit.source: Suspend: Automatically suspends a workflow job after a Write-Information command is carried out, to allow users to see the messages before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 后写入信息命令执行，以允许用户在继续之前查看的消息，挂起︰ 自动挂起工作流作业。

trans-unit.source: The workflow can be resumed at the user’s discretion.
trans-unit.target: 工作流可以继续在用户的决定。

trans-unit.source: SilentlyContinue: No effect.
trans-unit.target: SilentlyContinue︰ 不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The informational messages are not (Default) displayed, and the script continues without interruption.
trans-unit.target: 信息性消息不会显示 （默认值），并且该脚本继续运行而不会中断。

trans-unit.source: -InformationVariable [+]<variable-name> Alias: iv
trans-unit.target: -InformationVariable [+] < 变量名称 > 别名︰ iv

trans-unit.source: Introduced in Windows PowerShell 5.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 5.0 中引入。

trans-unit.source: Within the command or script in which it is used, the InformationVariable common parameter stores in a variable a string that you specify by adding the Write-Information command.
trans-unit.target: 在命令或使用它的脚本中，InformationVariable 通用参数将存储在变量中通过将写入信息命令添加指定的字符串的。

trans-unit.source: Write-Information values are shown depending on the value of the -InformationAction common parameter; if you do not add the -InformationAction common parameter, Write-Information strings are shown depending on the value of the $InformationPreference preference variable.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于-InformationAction 通用参数; 的值显示了写入信息的值如果不希望添加的 InformationAction 通用参数，具体取决于 $InformationPreference 首选项变量的值显示写入信息的字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information about $InformationPreference, see about_Preference_Variables.
trans-unit.target: 有关 $InformationPreference 详细信息，请参阅 about_Preference_Variables。

trans-unit.source: -OutBuffer <Int32> Alias: ob
trans-unit.target: -OutBuffer <Int32> 别名︰ ob

trans-unit.source: Determines the number of objects to accumulate in a buffer before any objects are sent through the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 确定要通过管道发送的任何对象之前会将堆积在缓冲区中的对象数。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this parameter, objects are sent as they are generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，生成将发送对象。

trans-unit.source: This resource management parameter is designed for advanced users.
trans-unit.target: 此资源管理参数专为高级用户。

trans-unit.source: When you use this parameter, Windows PowerShell does not call the next cmdlet in the pipeline until the number of objects generated equals OutBuffer + 1.
trans-unit.target: 当使用此参数时，Windows PowerShell 不调用下一个 cmdlet 在管道中直到生成的对象数等于 OutBuffer + 1。

trans-unit.source: Thereafter, it sends all objects as they are generated.
trans-unit.target: 此后，它将发送的所有对象生成。

trans-unit.source: -OutVariable [+]<variable-name> Alias: ov
trans-unit.target: -OutVariable [+] < 变量名称 > 别名︰ ov

trans-unit.source: Stores output objects from the command in the specified variable and displays it at the command line.
trans-unit.target: 将从该命令的输出对象存储在指定的变量，并将其显示在命令行。

trans-unit.source: To add the output to the variable, instead of replacing any output that might already be stored there, type a plus sign (+) before the variable name.
trans-unit.target: 若要将输出添加到该变量，而不是替换可能已存在，存储任何输出键入变量名之前的加号 （+）。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command creates the $out variable and stores the process object in it:
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下命令创建 $out 变量，并在该存储过程的对象︰

trans-unit.source: Get-Process PowerShell -OutVariable out
trans-unit.target: Get-process PowerShell-OutVariable 出

trans-unit.source: The following command adds the process object to the $out variable:
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令将进程对象添加到 $out 变量︰

trans-unit.source: Get-Process iexplore -OutVariable +out
trans-unit.target: 获取进程 iexplore-OutVariable + 扩展

trans-unit.source: The following command displays the contents of the $out variable:
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令显示 $out 变量的内容︰

trans-unit.source: $out
trans-unit.target: $out

trans-unit.source: -PipelineVariable <String> Alias: pv
trans-unit.target: -PipelineVariable <String> 别名︰ pv

trans-unit.source: PipelineVariable stores the value of the current pipeline element as a variable, for any named command as it flows through the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: PipelineVariable 将当前管道元素的值存储为一个变量，对于任何命名命令，它将根据通过管道。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are strings, the same as for any variable names.
trans-unit.target: 有效值为字符串，与任何变量的名称相同。

trans-unit.source: The following is an example of how PipelineVariable works.
trans-unit.target: 以下是 PipelineVariable 的工作原理的示例。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the PipelineVariable parameter is added to a Foreach-Object command to store the results of the command in variables.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，PipelineVariable 参数添加到 Foreach-object 命令，以便将该命令的结果存储在变量中。

trans-unit.source: A range of numbers, 1 to 10, are piped into the first Foreach-Object command, the results of which are stored in a variable named Left.
trans-unit.target: 数字 （1 到 10） 的范围是通过管道传递给第一个 Foreach-object 命令，其中结果存储在名为左侧的变量。

trans-unit.source: The results of the first Foreach-Object command are piped into a second Foreach-Object command, which filters the objects returned by the first Foreach-Object command.
trans-unit.target: 第一个 Foreach 对象命令的结果是通过管道传递给第二个 Foreach 对象命令，它将筛选返回的第一个 Foreach 对象命令的对象。

trans-unit.source: The results of the second command are stored in a variable named Right.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令的结果存储在名为右侧的变量。

trans-unit.source: In the third Foreach-Object command, the results of the first two Foreach-Object piped commands, represented by the variables Left and Right, are processed by using a multiplication operator.
trans-unit.target: 在第三个 Foreach-object 命令中前, 两个 Foreach 对象的结果通过管道传递的命令、 左侧和右侧表示变量、 通过使用乘法运算符处理。

trans-unit.source: The command instructs objects stored in the Left and Right variables to be multiplied, and specifies that the results should be displayed as "Left range member * Right range member = product".
trans-unit.target: 该命令指示将与其相乘的左侧和右侧的变量中存储的对象，并指定结果应显示为"左的范围成员 * Right 区域成员 = 产品"。

trans-unit.source: 1..10 | Foreach-Object -PipelineVariable Left -Process { $_ } |
trans-unit.target: 1..10 |左-Foreach-object PipelineVariable 处理 {$_} |

trans-unit.source: Foreach-Object -PV Right -Process { 1..10 } | Foreach-Object -Process { "$Left$Right = " + ($Left$Right) }
trans-unit.target: Right-Foreach-object PV 处理 {1..10} | Foreach-object-进程 {"$Left$ 右 ="+ （$Left$ 右侧）}

trans-unit.source: -Verbose[:{$true | $false}] Alias: vb
trans-unit.target: -Verbose [: {$true | $false}] 别名︰ vb

trans-unit.source: Displays detailed information about the operation performed by the command.
trans-unit.target: 显示有关由命令执行的操作的详细的信息。

trans-unit.source: This information resembles the information in a trace or in a transaction log.
trans-unit.target: 此信息类似于在跟踪或事务日志中的信息。

trans-unit.source: This parameter works only when the command generates a verbose message.
trans-unit.target: 此参数仅用于该命令将生成详细的消息。

trans-unit.source: For example, this parameter works when a command contains the Write-Verbose cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此参数适用时的命令包含 Write-verbose cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The Verbose parameter overrides the value of the $VerbosePreference variable for the current command.
trans-unit.target: Verbose 参数将覆盖当前命令 $VerbosePreference 变量的值。

trans-unit.source: Because the default value of the $VerbosePreference variable is SilentlyContinue, verbose messages are not displayed by default.
trans-unit.target: 因为 $VerbosePreference 变量的默认值为 SilentlyContinue，默认情况下不显示详细消息。

trans-unit.source: Valid values:
trans-unit.target: 有效值：

trans-unit.source: $true (-Verbose:$true) has the same effect as -Verbose.
trans-unit.target: $true (-verbose: $true) 具有相同的效果-Verbose。

trans-unit.source: $false (-Verbose:$false) suppresses the display of verbose messages.
trans-unit.target: $false (-verbose: $false) 禁止显示详细消息。

trans-unit.source: Use this parameter when the value of $VerbosePreference is not SilentlyContinue (the default).
trans-unit.target: $VerbosePreference 的值不为 SilentlyContinue （默认值） 时，请使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: -WarningAction[:{Continue | Inquire | SilentlyContinue | Stop}] Alias: wa
trans-unit.target: -WarningAction [: {继续 |查询 |SilentlyContinue |停止}] 别名︰ wa

trans-unit.source: Determines how the cmdlet responds to a warning from the command.
trans-unit.target: 确定该 cmdlet 如何响应来自该命令的一条警告。

trans-unit.source: "Continue" is the default value.
trans-unit.target: "继续"是默认值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter works only when the command generates a warning message.
trans-unit.target: 此参数仅用于该命令将生成一条警告消息。

trans-unit.source: For example, this parameter works when a command contains the Write-Warning cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此参数适用时的命令包含 Write-warning cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The WarningAction parameter overrides the value of the $WarningPreference variable for the current command.
trans-unit.target: WarningAction 参数将覆盖当前命令 $WarningPreference 变量的值。

trans-unit.source: Because the default value of the $WarningPreference variable is Continue, warnings are displayed and execution continues unless you use the WarningAction parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因为 $WarningPreference 变量的默认值为 Continue，将显示警告并继续执行，除非您使用 WarningAction 参数。

trans-unit.source: Valid Values:
trans-unit.target: 有效值：

trans-unit.source: Continue.
trans-unit.target: 继续进行。

trans-unit.source: Displays the warning message and continues executing the command.
trans-unit.target: 将显示警告消息并继续执行该命令。

trans-unit.source: "Continue" is the default value.
trans-unit.target: "继续"是默认值。

trans-unit.source: Inquire.
trans-unit.target: 查询。

trans-unit.source: Displays the warning message and prompts you for confirmation before continuing execution.
trans-unit.target: 将显示警告消息并提示您在继续执行前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: This value is rarely used.
trans-unit.target: 很少使用此值。

trans-unit.source: SilentlyContinue.
trans-unit.target: SilentlyContinue。

trans-unit.source: Suppresses the warning message and continues executing the command.
trans-unit.target: 禁止显示警告消息并继续执行该命令。

trans-unit.source: Stop.
trans-unit.target: 停止。

trans-unit.source: Displays the warning message and stops executing the command.
trans-unit.target: 将显示警告消息并停止执行命令。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: The WarningAction parameter does not override the value of the $WarningAction preference variable when the parameter is used in a command to run a script or function.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ WarningAction 参数不重写 $WarningAction 首选项变量的值，如果使用参数在命令中以运行脚本或函数。

trans-unit.source: -WarningVariable [+]<variable-name> Alias: wv
trans-unit.target: -WarningVariable [+] < 变量名称 > 别名︰ 西弗吉尼亚州

trans-unit.source: Stores warnings about the command in the specified variable.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的变量中存储有关该命令的警告。

trans-unit.source: All generated warnings are saved in the variable even if the warnings are not displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 即使不会向用户显示警告，所有生成的警告被保存在变量中。

trans-unit.source: To append the warnings to the variable content, instead of replacing any warnings that might already be stored there, type a plus sign (+) before the variable name.
trans-unit.target: 要追加到变量的内容，而不是替换可能已存在，存储的任何警告的警告键入变量名之前的加号 （+）。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command creates the $a variable and then stores any warnings in it:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的命令创建 $a 变量，并将任何警告然后存储在它︰

trans-unit.source: Get-Process -Id 6 -WarningVariable a
trans-unit.target: Get-process-Id 6-WarningVariable

trans-unit.source: The following command adds any warnings to the $a variable:
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令将所有警告都添加到 $a 变量中︰

trans-unit.source: Get-Process -Id 2 -WarningVariable +a
trans-unit.target: Get-process-Id 为 2-WarningVariable + a

trans-unit.source: The following command displays the contents of $a:
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令显示 $ a︰ 内容

trans-unit.source: $a
You can use this parameter to create a variable that contains only warnings from specific commands.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此参数创建变量，其中包含仅从特定的命令的警告。

trans-unit.source: You can use array notation, such as $a[0] or $warning[1,2] to refer to specific warnings stored in the variable.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用数组表示法，如 $a [0] 或 $warning [1，2] 来引用存储在变量中的特定警告。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: The WarningVariable parameter does not capture warnings from nested calls in functions or scripts.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ WarningVariable 参数不会捕获嵌套调用的函数或脚本中的警告。

trans-unit.source: Risk Management Parameter Descriptions
trans-unit.target: 风险管理参数说明

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf[:{$true | $false}] Alias: wi
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf [: {$true | $false}] 别名︰ wi

trans-unit.source: Displays a message that describes the effect of the command, instead of executing the command.
trans-unit.target: 显示一条消息，说明该命令，而不是执行该命令的效果。

trans-unit.source: The WhatIf parameter overrides the value of the $WhatIfPreference variable for the current command.
trans-unit.target: WhatIf 参数将覆盖当前命令 $WhatIfPreference 变量的值。

trans-unit.source: Because the default value of the $WhatIfPreference variable is 0 (disabled), WhatIf behavior is not performed without the WhatIf parameter.
trans-unit.target: 由于 $WhatIfPreference 变量的默认值为 0 （禁用），WhatIf 行为则不执行不带 WhatIf 参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, type the following command:
trans-unit.target: 详细信息，请键入以下命令︰

trans-unit.source: Get-Help about_Preference_Variables
trans-unit.target: 获取帮助 about_Preference_Variables

trans-unit.source: Valid values:
trans-unit.target: 有效值：

trans-unit.source: $true (-WhatIf:$true).
trans-unit.target: $true (-WhatIf: $true)。

trans-unit.source: Has the same effect as -WhatIf.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同的效果-WhatIf。

trans-unit.source: $false (-WhatIf:$false).
trans-unit.target: $false (-WhatIf: $false)。

trans-unit.source: Suppresses the automatic WhatIf behavior that results when the value of the $WhatIfPreference variable is 1.
trans-unit.target: 取消导致 $WhatIfPreference 变量的值为 1 时的自动 WhatIf 行为。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command uses the WhatIf parameter in a Remove-Item command:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的命令使用 WhatIf 参数中的 Remove-item 命令︰

trans-unit.source: PS> Remove-Item Date.csv -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: PS > Remove-item Date.csv-WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Instead of removing the item, Windows PowerShell lists the operations it would perform and the items that would be affected.
trans-unit.target: 而不是删除项目，Windows PowerShell 列出它会执行的操作以及将受到影响的项。

trans-unit.source: This command produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 此命令将产生以下输出︰

trans-unit.source: What if: Performing operation "Remove File" on Target "C:\ps-test\date.csv".
trans-unit.target: 如果︰ 执行操作目标"C:\ps-test\date.csv"上的"删除文件"。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm[:{$true | $false}] Alias: cf
trans-unit.target: 确认 [: {$true | $false}] 别名︰ cf

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before executing the command.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令之前提示你进行确认。

trans-unit.source: The Confirm parameter overrides the value of the $ConfirmPreference variable for the current command.
trans-unit.target: Confirm 参数将覆盖当前命令 $ConfirmPreference 变量的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is High.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为高。

trans-unit.source: For more information, type the following command:
trans-unit.target: 详细信息，请键入以下命令︰

trans-unit.source: Get-Help about_Preference_Variables
trans-unit.target: 获取帮助 about_Preference_Variables

trans-unit.source: Valid values:
trans-unit.target: 有效值：

trans-unit.source: $true (-Confirm:$true).
trans-unit.target: $true (-确认︰ $true)。

trans-unit.source: Has the same effect as -Confirm.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同的效果进行的确认。

trans-unit.source: $false(-Confirm:$false).
trans-unit.target: $false(-Confirm:$false)。

trans-unit.source: Suppresses automatic confirmation, which occurs when the value of $ConfirmPreference is less than or equal to the estimated risk of the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将取消自动确认，$ConfirmPreference 的值小于或等于该 cmdlet 的估计风险时发生。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command uses the Confirm parameter with a Remove-Item command.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的命令使用 Remove-item 命令使用 Confirm 参数。

trans-unit.source: Before removing the item, Windows PowerShell lists the operations it would perform and the items that would be affected, and asks for approval.
trans-unit.target: 在删除之前的项，Windows PowerShell 列出它会执行的操作与将受到影响，并要求批准的项。

trans-unit.source: PS C:\ps-test> Remove-Item tmp*.txt -Confirm
trans-unit.target: PS C:\ps-test > Remove-item tmp*.txt-确认

trans-unit.source: This command produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 此命令将产生以下输出︰

trans-unit.source: Confirm Are you sure you want to perform this action?
trans-unit.target: 确认是否确实要执行此操作？

trans-unit.source: Performing operation "Remove File" on Target " C:\ps-test\tmp1.txt [Y] Yes [A] Yes to All [N] No [L] No to All [S] Suspend [?] Help (default is "Y"):
trans-unit.target: 执行操作上的"删除文件"目标"C:\ps-test\tmp1.txt [Y] 是 [A] 是为所有 [N] 没有 [L] 不为所有 [S] 挂起 [？]（默认值为"Y"） 的帮助︰

trans-unit.source: The Confirm response options are as follows:
trans-unit.target: 确认响应选项如下所示︰

trans-unit.source: Yes (Y) Perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 是 (Y) 执行该操作。

trans-unit.source: Yes to All (A) Perform all actions and suppress subsequent Confirm queries for this command.
trans-unit.target: 是到所有 (A) 执行所有操作，并禁止显示此命令的后续确认查询。

trans-unit.source: No (N): Do not perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 无 (N)︰ 未执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: No to All (L): Do not perform any actions and suppress subsequent Confirm queries for this command.
trans-unit.target: 不到所有 (L): 不执行任何操作，并禁止显示此命令的后续确认查询。

trans-unit.source: Suspend (S): Pause the command and create a temporary session.
trans-unit.target: 挂起 (S): 暂停该命令，并创建一个临时会话。

trans-unit.source: Help (?) Display help for these options.
trans-unit.target: 帮助 （？） 显示有关这些选项的帮助。

trans-unit.source: The Suspend option places the command on hold and creates a temporary nested session in which you can work until you're ready to choose a Confirm option.
trans-unit.target: 挂起选项位置上的命令保存和创建一个临时嵌套的会话，在其中您可以处理直到您就可以选择确认选项。

trans-unit.source: The command prompt for the nested session has two extra carets (>>) to indicate that it's a child operation of the original parent command.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的会话的命令提示符下有两个额外的插入符号 (>>) 以指示它是原始父命令的子操作。

trans-unit.source: You can run commands and scripts in the nested session.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在嵌套的会话中运行命令和脚本。

trans-unit.source: To end the nested session and return to the Confirm options for the original command, type "exit".
trans-unit.target: 若要结束嵌套的会话并返回到原始命令确认选项，请键入"exit"。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the Suspend option (S) is used to halt a command temporarily while the user checks the help for a command parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，挂起选项 (S) 用于在用户签命令参数的帮助时暂时停止命令。

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the needed information, the user types "exit" to end the nested prompt and then selects the Yes (y) response to the Confirm query.
trans-unit.target: 获取所需的信息之后, 用户类型"退出"以结束嵌套的提示，然后选择是 (y) 确认查询响应。

trans-unit.source: PS C:\ps-test> New-Item -ItemType File -Name Test.txt -Confirm
trans-unit.target: PS C:\ps-test > 新项 ItemType 文件命名为 Test.txt 的确认

trans-unit.source: Confirm Are you sure you want to perform this action?
trans-unit.target: 确认是否确实要执行此操作？

trans-unit.source: Performing operation "Create File" on Target "Destination: C:\ps-test\test.txt".
trans-unit.target: 执行操作目标"目标:: C:\ps-test\test.txt"上的"创建文件"。

trans-unit.source: [Y] Yes [A] Yes to All [N] No [L] No to All [S] Suspend [?] Help (default is "Y"): s
trans-unit.target: [Y] 是 [A] 是为所有 [N] 否为所有 [S] 没有 [L] 挂起 [？]（默认值为"Y"） 的帮助︰ s

trans-unit.source: PS C:\ps-test>>> Get-Help New-Item -Parameter ItemType
trans-unit.target: PS C:\ps-test >>> 获取帮助新项-参数 ItemType

trans-unit.source: -ItemType <string> Specifies the provider-specified type of the new item.
trans-unit.target: -ItemType <string> 指定提供程序指定新项的类型。

trans-unit.source: Required?
trans-unit.target: 是否必需？

trans-unit.source: false Position?
trans-unit.target: false 位置？

trans-unit.source: named Default value Accept pipeline input?
trans-unit.target: 已命名的默认值接受管道输入？

trans-unit.source: true (ByPropertyName) Accept wildcard characters?
trans-unit.target: true (ByPropertyName) 接受通配符？

trans-unit.source: false
trans-unit.target: false

trans-unit.source: PS C:\ps-test>>> exit
trans-unit.target: PS C:\ps-test >>> 退出

trans-unit.source: Confirm Are you sure you want to perform this action?
trans-unit.target: 确认是否确实要执行此操作？

trans-unit.source: Performing operation "Create File" on Target "Destination: C:\ps-test\test.txt".
trans-unit.target: 执行操作目标"目标:: C:\ps-test\test.txt"上的"创建文件"。

trans-unit.source: [Y] Yes [A] Yes to All [N] No [L] No to All [S] Suspend [?] Help (default is "Y"): y
trans-unit.target: [Y] 是 [A] 是为所有 [N] 否为所有 [S] 没有 [L] 挂起 [？]（默认值为"Y"） 的帮助︰ y

trans-unit.source: Directory: C:\ps-test
trans-unit.target: 目录︰ C:\ps-test

trans-unit.source: Mode LastWriteTime Length Name
trans-unit.target: 模式 上次写入时间 长度名称
----2010 年 8 月 27 日下午 2:41 0 test.txt

trans-unit.source: KEYWORDS
trans-unit.target: 关键字

trans-unit.source: about_Common_Parameters
trans-unit.target: about_Common_Parameters

trans-unit.source: SEE ALSO
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: about_Preference_Variables Write-Debug Write-Warning Write-Error Write-Verbose
trans-unit.target: Write-debug 写入警告写入错误 Write-verbose about_Preference_Variables
